00023 define('UPLOAD_FAILED', 0);
00024 define('UPLOAD_SUCCESS', 1);
00025 define('FILETYPE_NOT_ALLOWED', 2);
00026 define('FILESIZE_EXCED', 3);
00027 
00037 class simbio_file_upload extends simbio
00038 {
00039     private $allowable_ext = array('.jpg', '.jpeg', '.gif', '.png', '.html', '.htm', '.pdf', '.doc', '.txt');
00040     private $max_size = 1024000; // in bytes
00041     private $upload_dir = './';
00042     public $new_filename;
00043 
00044 
00051     public function setAllowableFormat($array_allowable_ext)
00052     {
00053         if ($array_allowable_ext == '*') {
00054             $this->allowable_ext = '*';
00055             return;
00056         }
00057 
00058         if (is_array($array_allowable_ext)) {
00059             $this->allowable_ext = $array_allowable_ext;
00060         } else {
00061             echo 'setAllowableFormat method error : The argument for must be an array';
00062             return;
00063         }
00064     }
00065 
00066 
00073     public function setMaxSize($int_max_size)
00074     {
00075         // checking for php.ini upload_size
00076         $this->max_size = intval($int_max_size);
00077     }
00078 
00079 
00086     public function setUploadDir($str_upload_dir)
00087     {
00088         $this->upload_dir = $str_upload_dir;
00089     }
00090 
00091 
00099     public function doUpload($file_input_name, $str_new_filename = '')
00100     {
00101         // get file extension
00102         $file_ext = substr($_FILES[$file_input_name]['name'], strrpos($_FILES[$file_input_name]['name'], '.'));
00103         if (empty($str_new_filename)) {
00104             $this->new_filename = basename($_FILES[$file_input_name]['name']);
00105         } else {
00106             $this->new_filename = $str_new_filename.$file_ext;
00107         }
00108 
00109         $_isTypeAllowed = 0;
00110         // checking file extensions
00111         if ($this->allowable_ext != '*') {
00112             foreach ($this->allowable_ext as $ext) {
00113                 if ($ext == $file_ext) {
00114                     $_isTypeAllowed++;
00115                 }
00116             }
00117 
00118             if (!$_isTypeAllowed) {
00119                 $this->error = 'Filetype is forbidden';
00120                 return FILETYPE_NOT_ALLOWED;
00121             }
00122         }
00123 
00124         // check for file size
00125         $_size_kb = ((integer)$this->max_size)/1024;
00126         if ($_FILES[$file_input_name]['size'] > $this->max_size) {
00127             $this->error = 'Filesize is excedded maximum uploaded file size';
00128             return FILESIZE_EXCED;
00129         }
00130 
00131         // uploading file
00132         if (@move_uploaded_file($_FILES[$file_input_name]['tmp_name'], $this->upload_dir.'/'.$this->new_filename)) {
00133             return UPLOAD_SUCCESS;
00134         } else {
00135             $upload_error = error_get_last();
00136             $error_msg = '';
00137             if ($upload_error) {
00138                 $error_msg = 'PHP Error ('.$upload_error['message'].')';
00139             }
00140             $this->error = 'Upload failed. Upload directory is not writable or not exists. '.$error_msg;
00141             return UPLOAD_FAILED;
00142         }
00143     }
00144 }
00145 ?>
